import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get survey details"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/surveys/{SurveyId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single survey by ID, including all configured questions.

**Prerequisites**
1. **SurveyId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/surveys](/docs/api/surveys/get-surveys) to list available surveys. Extract `Item[].SurveyId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List surveys: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys](/docs/api/surveys/get-surveys) -&gt; extract `SurveyId`
2. Get details: GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}
3. Review questions in `Questions[]` array
4. Check linked rules: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}/rules](/docs/api/surveys/get-survey-rules)

**Response includes**: Survey metadata, introduction text, expiration settings, reminder schedule, and all question definitions.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"SurveyId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the survey to retrieve."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Survey retrieved successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Single survey was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the survey was last modified."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the survey."},"Intro":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Introductory text shown to users before the survey questions."},"IsActive":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the survey is currently active and can be assigned."},"ExpirationInDays":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Number of days after assignment before the survey 7])."},"Questions":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"A question within a survey, including its type and response when used in survey
